user_input: Modify the DHEM model. o Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline) o Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas. o Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities o Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step o Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the appropriate datafile attribute from the list of available attributes.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the appropriate file to modify from the available datafiles.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the appropriate scenario context from the available options.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class using the datafile variation and the newly created scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, update the properties for objects in the specified categories.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', incorporate the new scenario 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities', and rename the cloned model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input, select the model to clone and apply the scenario update.
